did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence and reports about the hortorium and material on Conservation Farming in the Tropical Uplands (CFTU); Cornell International Institute for Food, Agriculture and Development (CIIFAD); the Organization for Tropical Studies and the Society for Economic Botany.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Bates is Professor Emeritus, Plant Biology (Bailey Hortorium) and former Director of the L. H. Bailey Hortorium at Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence and reports about the hortorium and material on Conservation Farming in the Tropical Uplands (CFTU); Cornell International Institute for Food, Agriculture and Development (CIIFAD); the Organization for Tropical Studies and the Society for Economic Botany.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Conservation Farming in the Tropical Uplands.
Cornell International Institute for Food, Agriculture, and Development

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: David Bates papers, #34-1-2495. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Correspondence arranged by year and by subject
Manual and Cyclopedia of Horticulture and Hortus III
Conservation Farming in the Tropical Uplands (CFTU) and Cornell International Institute for Food, Agriculture and Development (CIIFAD)
Conservation Farming in the Tropical Uplands CFTU; Organization for Tropical Studies; Society for Economic Botany
"The L.H. Bailey Hortorium: Future Directions" by David Bates
